content: --- title: Reference Data Models description: published: true date: 2025-03-18T16:28:00.332Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T10:41:04.982Z --- # Crew Activity Codes Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | type | `'string'` | Type of the non flying crew activity. LEAVE, OFF, STANDBY, GROUND, TRAVEL or ONLINE_TRAVEL. | | subtype | `'string'` | Name of the non flying crew activity | | code | `'string'` | Activity code of the non flying crew activity | | codeDescription | `'string'` | Description of the activity code | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Timezones Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | timezoneId | `'string'` | Name of timezone | | startLong | `'string'` | Longtitude of the start location of timezone | | endLong | `'string'` | Longtitude of the end location of timezone | | exception | `'string'` | Exceptions of timezone application | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # UTC Offsets Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | offsetId | `'string'` | Id of offset configuration | | longitude | `'string'` | Longtitude of the offset | | std | `'string'` | UTC time when DST not applying | | dst | `'string'` | UTC time when DST applying | | offset | `'string'` | Offset in minutes | | start | `'datetime'` | Start date and time of the offset rule | | end | `'datetime'` | End date and time of the offset rule | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information |
fm:title: Reference Data Models description: published: true date: 2025-03-18T16:28:00.332Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T10:41:04.982Z
